pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# pyauditor**pyauditor** is a Python library which simplifies the interaction with AUDITOR from Python.For more information please [visit our website](https://alu-schumacher.github.io/AUDITOR/).

pyauditor Documentation | Auditor Documentation
